Rayon Sports vs AS Kigali

Rayon Sports 1-0 AS Kigali

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Ngabo Roben

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

18:39

Amwe mu mafoto yaranze uyu mukino

17:24

Umukino urangiye ku ntsinzi ya Rayon Sports

Ikipe ya Rayon Sports ibonye amanota atatu nyuma yo gutsinda AS Kigali 1-0, igitego cyatsinzwe na Michael Sarpong, bizamuye ikipe ye ku mwanya wa gatatu muri shampiyona n'amanota 15 aho irushwa na Mukura VS iyoboye urutonde inota rimwe.

17:22

93' Gusimbuza kwa nyuma ku ruhande rwa Rayon Sports

Mutsinzi Ange Jimmy asimbuye Mugisha Gilbert wavunitse

17:20

NTIBISANZWE,AS Kigali ihawe ikarita y'umutuku ya kabiri mu minota ibiri

Ishimwe Kevin wari wagiye mu kibuga asimbuye akoreye amakosa abiri Rutanga Eric na Niyonzima Olivier Sefu abishaka mu maso y'umusifuzi none nawe ahawe ikarita y'umutuku. Abakinnyi ba AS Kigali ntibabyumva

17:18

Iminota itatu y'inyongera

Iminota 90 y'umukino uri guhuza Rayon Sports irarangiye hongerwaho iminota itatu y'inyongera

17:16

AS Kigali ihawe ikarita itukura

Abakinnyi batatu ba Rayon Sports; Manishimwe Djabel, Yannick Mukunzi na Gilbert Mugisha bahererekanyije umupira neza, bawucomekera Sarpong wirukankaga agana izamu ariko akururwa imyenda na Rurangwa Mossi ahabwa ikarita ya kabiri y'umuhondo, biba ikarita itukura.

17:13

85' Rayon Sports itsinze igitego umusifuzi aracyanga

Ku mupira uzamukanywe na Niyonzima Olivier Sefu acomekera umupira Mugisha Gilbert atazuyaje awuha Michael Sarpong atsinda igitego cyashoboraga kuba icya kabiri ariko umusifuzi yemeje ko hari habanje kubaho kurarira

17:11

AS Kigali yakoze amakosa menshi yongeye guhabwa ikarita y'umuhondo

Ininahazwe Fabrice bita Messi asimbukiye umupira awuhurira ho na Nova Bayama ariko Messi atega Nova inkokora bituma umusifuzi amuha ikarita y'umuhondo

17:08

78' Masudi Djuma ari ku gitutu kidasanzwe

Umutoza w'Umurundi Masudi Djuma uri guhangana n'ikipe yahesheje ibikombe mu myaka ibiri ishize ari ku gitutu kiri gutuma ava imbere y'intebe z'abatoza n'abasimbura b'ikipe ye akajya mu gice cya Rayon Sports ashaka gutanga inama ku bakunnyi bari kure ye ariko abasifuzi baramwihanangirije.

16:58

Masudi Djuma asimbuje umukinnyi wa gatatu

Umutoza wa AS Kigali asimbuje umukinnyi wa gatatu muri uyu mukino, Frank Kalanda atanga umwanya kuri Jimmy Kibengo mbaraga

16:57

69' Rayon Sports ihawe ikarita y'umuhondo ya mbere

Yannick Mukunzi ateye 'tackle' aturutse inyuma ya Ntamuhanga Tumaine Tity amukorera ikosa none Hakizimana Louis amuhaye ikarita y'umuhondo

16:52

64' Gusimbuza kwa kabiri ku ruhande rwa AS Kigali

Ndayisenga Fuadi ufite inararibonye ntabwo yorohewe n'uyu mukino none asimbujwe Muhozi Freddy w'imyaka 21 gusa

16:50

Amwe mu mafoto yaranze igice cya mbere cy'uyu mukino

16:46

58' Umunyezamu wa Rayon Sports Bashunga Abouba aryamye hasi

Mu gihe AS Kigali yari itangiye guhererekanya neza inasatira ishaka igitego cyo kwishyura umunyezamu wa Rayon Sports Bashunga Abouba ahamagaye umusifuzi amubwira ko ari kubabara ikirenge aryama hasi ariko abaganga bamwitayeho umukino ugiye gukomeza

16:40

52' Gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa AS Kigali

Ndabimana Eric Zidane wagowe cyane n'abakinnyi bo hagati ba Rayon Sports asimbujwe Ishimwe Kevin usatira aciye ku ruhande rw'ibumoso

16:35

47' IGITEGO CYA MBERE CYA RAYON SPORTS

Rutahizamu Michael Sarpong ukomoka muri Ghana afunguye amazamu ku mupira uzamukanywe na Manishimwe Djabel atera ishoti rikomeye umupira ukubita umutambiko uragaruka uhura na Sarpong bita Balloteri atsindira ikipe ye igitego cya kane muri shampiyona

16:31

Igice cya kabiri gitangijwe na AS Kigali

Fuadi Ndayisenga niwe utangije igice cya kabiri cy'umukino uri guhuza AS Kigali na Raypn Sports

16:19

Igice cya mbere kirangiye amakipe yombi anganya

Nubwo amakipe yombi yasatiranye inshuro nyinshi ariko nta n'imwe irashobora kureba mu izamu ry'indi. Abatoza bombi bagiye mu rwambariro kuganiriza abakinnyi babo.

16:15

Iminota ibiri y'inyongera ku gice cya mbere

Umusifuzi wa kane Uwikunda Samuel amanitse iminota ibiri y'inyongera kuko iminota 45 y'igice cya mbere yari irangiye

16:13

42' Rutanga Eric yazengereje Rutangwa udafite inararibonye

Rurangwa Mossi w'imyaka 19 gusa uri gukina nka myugariro w'iburyo wa AS Kigali ntabwo yorohewe kuko acenzwe na Rutanga Eric bita Alba ahindura umupira mwiza ashaka Michael Sarpong ariko uyu munya-Ghana ntiyagera ku mupira urengera ku rundi ruhande

16:08

36' Masudi Djuma ntabwo ari kwishimira imyanzuro y'umusifuzi

Abakinnyi ba AS Kigali bakomeje guhanwa kenshi n'umusifuzi Loup abashinja gukorera amakosa Rayon Sports ariko ntabwo yemeranywa n'umutoza Masudi Djuma

16:00

Fabrice Mugheni ushobora kuba yababaye cyane ajyanywe kwa muganga

Uyu mukinnyi ukomoka muri RD Congo wagushije urutugu ushobora kuba yavunitse bikomeye ajyanwe mu mbangukira gutabara ajyanwa kwa muganga

15:59

Kuri iki kibuga, Masudi Djuma yahandikiye amateka

27' Coup franc ya Rayon Sports

Manishimwe Djabel azamukanye umupira neza awucomekera Michael Sarpong ariko akorerwa ikosa na myugariro w'Intamba ku rugamba z'i Burundi Ngando Omar haboneka Coup franc ariko Manishimwe Djabel ayitera hejuru y'izamu

15:56

24' Bashunga Abouba akuyemo umupira washoboraga kubyara igitego cya AS Kigali

Ndayisenga Fuadi wabaye kapiteni wa Rayon Sports mu 2012 kugera 2014 ubu uri muri AS Kigali azamukanye umupira neza ku ruhande rw'ibumoso atungurana atera ishoti rikomeye ariko Bashunga Abouba atabara izamu rye umupira arawurenza

15:53

21' Gusimbuza kwa mbere ku ruhande rwa Rayon Sports

15:49

17' AS Kigali ihawe ikarita ya kabiri y'umuhondo

15:46

15' Ikarita ya mbere y'umuhondo

Nyuma yo gucenga abakinnyi babiri Fabrice Mugheni yari agiye gutera mu izamu ariko akururwa imyenda na Rurangwa Mossi bimuviramo ikarita y'umuhondi, ariko coup franc ntacyo ibyaye.

13' Gilbert Mugisha wagiriwe icyizere ahushije igitego ku ishoti rikomeye

Umutoza Robertinho wa Rayon Sports yagiriye icyizere rutahizamu ukiri muto Mugisha Gilbert ngo asimbure Bimenyimana Bonfils Caleb wahanwe na FERWAFA. Uyu mukinnyi w'imyaka 20 gusa agerageje ishoti rikomeye ari hanze y'urubuga rw'amahina ariko umupira unyura iruhande rw'izamu

15:44

09' Fabrice Mugheni ntabwo yishimiwe na bagenzi be

15:37

Komisiyo y'uburenganzira bwa muntu yafatanyije na FERWAFA muri uyu mukino
